definitions.definition: A tree of species Sassafras albidum of the eastern United States and Asia having mitten - shaped leaves and red, aromatic heartwood .
A tree of any species in the genus Sassafras .
The bark of the root of this plant, used for medicinal and (mostly historically) culinary purposes and formerly a main ingredient in root beer.

main_definition: ( countable ) A tree of species Sassafras albidum of the eastern United States and Asia having mitten - shaped leaves and red, aromatic heartwood .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A tree of any species in the genus Sassafras .
( uncountable ) The bark of the root of this plant, used for medicinal and (mostly historically) culinary purposes and formerly a main ingredient in root beer.
